title: Voter Registration
report: Contact the Maricopa County Democratic Party at https://www.maricopadems.org/ or (602)-298-0503 for volunteer opportunities. Click on the link or phone icon above. Even a few hours will make a difference.

title: Vote in the Primary
report: If you are on the Early Vote list, be looking for your mail-in ballot. And, return it within 48 hours

title: Find Your LD
description: Find your Legislative District and volunteer.
report: Click on the link above and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find out how you can help. All LDs have many opportunities for volunteering. Even a few hours will make a difference.

title: Support Sinema
report: We can send a Democratic Senator to Congress when we help to elect Krysten Sinema. Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Be the Blue Wave
description: Be part of the Neighbor to Neighbor Program.
report: Click on the link above! This short training program will give you the skills and tools you need to reach out to Democrats and Independents in your neighborhood. The process and message are clear. You just need to remind them to vote.

title: Support Malik
report: The Arizona Republic is recommending voters elect Anita Malik in a strong field because she is smart, well-spoken and brings a business focus that is attractive to voters in District 6. Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Join AZ DLCC
description: Help elect Democrats in the AZ House and Senate.
report: Republicans control both chambers of the AZ state legislature, but we're here to change that. Click on the link above and sign up today. Every seat in the State Legislature is up for election and Democrats are just three seats away from taking back control of the State Senate.

title: Flip the House
description: Stop the GOP agenda by working together.

title: Support Marsh
report: We can send a Democratic Senator to the AZ Senate when we help to elect Christene Marsh. Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Change Immigration Policy
report: If we all speak up right now, Congress will be forced to use its platform to oppose Trump's ever-worsening immigration enforcement. Click on this link to help.
